import React, { Component } from 'react' import AuthenticationService from '../service/AuthenticationService'; import ShowService from '../service/ShowService'; class CreateShowComponent extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { showName: '', venue: '', writer: '', director: '', designer: '', technicalDirector: '', estimateType: 'Scenic', passwordConfirm: '', showErrorMessage: false, errorMessage: 'Error Creating the Show' } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) this.createClicked = this.createClicked.bind(this) this.cancelClicked = this.cancelClicked.bind(this) } handleChange(event) { this.setState( {[event.target.name]: event.target.value} ) } createClicked() { var show = { name: this.state.showName, venue: this.state.password, writer: this.state.firstName, director: this.state.lastName, technicalDirector: this.state.lastName, estimateType: this.state.estimateType } ShowService .createNewShow(show) .then((response) => { if (response.data.success) { this.setState({ showErrorMessage: false }) this.props.history.push('/shows') } else { this.setState({ showErrorMessage: true }) this.setState({errorMessage: "Show creation failed"}) } }).catch(() => { this.setState({ showErrorMessage: true }) this.setState({errorMessage: "Show creation failed"}) }) } cancelClicked() { this.props.history.push('/shows') } render() { return (

Create New Show

{/* Show Name */}
{/* Estimate Type */}
{/* Director */}
{/* Venue */}
{/* Email */}
{/* Password */}
Your password must be 8-20 characters long, contain letters and numbers, and must not contain spaces, special characters, or emoji. { this.state.showErrorMessage && // Account creation error
{this.state.errorMessage}
}
) } } export default CreateShowComponent
